casebody.data:
Robert J. WOJCINSKI, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Arthur J. FOLEY and Arthur J. Foley, Jr., jointly and severally, Defendants-Appellees. No. 297, Docket 28575. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Jan. 23, 1964. Decided Jan. 23, 1964. *666Robert J. Lord, Detroit, Mich., for plaintiff-appellant. Gardner A. Callanen, Jr., Utica, N. Y., for defendants-appellees.

Before FRIENDLY and HAYS, Circuit Judges, and ANDERSON,* District Judge.

Sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM.

We affirm in open court on the well-reasoned opinion of Judge Brennan. 226 F.Supp. 157.

I
